cancellationPolicies.label: Free Cancellation rates
cancellationPolicies.description: If you cancel your booking before 23:59 29th Oct 2025 (NZDT) your deposit will be refunded to your payment card. If you cancel after 23:59 29th Oct 2025 (NZDT) or in the event of a no-show, your deposit will not be refunded and the total of the first night's accommodation will be charged to your payment card, unless otherwise stated (see 'Things to Note' information). Please note that cancellations must be made directly within your booking in My Account.

dorms.name: Standard 8 Bed Mixed Dorm
dorms.description: Dormitory style and range in size from 2 beds upwards.  They offer mixed accommodation.
dorms.labelDescription:
Great room with seaview. Lots of space to store your things and charge your devices.
All bed linen provided. 4 sturdy , 'no creak' wooden bunks. Heated in winter.  
Opens onto sunny garden courtyard with free hot tub, great for after surfing!

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.

dorms.name: Standard 6 Bed Mixed Dorm
dorms.description: Dormitory style and range in size from 2 beds upwards.  They offer mixed accommodation.
dorms.labelDescription: What a large spacious room! With a big balcony over looking the sea and mountain. It has 1 queen sized bed and three sturdy wooden bunk beds, and still has plenty of space. Located upstairs in the holiday house part of the hostel, guests love this room!!

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.

dorms.name: Standard 3 Bed Mixed Dorm
dorms.description: Dormitory style and range in size from 2 beds upwards.  They offer mixed accommodation.
dorms.labelDescription: Warm, pretty room, sharing with just 2 others. Comfortable bed, all bedding provided. Opens onto sunny garden courtyard where your hammock awaits! Try the free hot tub, great for after surfing! Theres also free to use kayaks, & $10 yoga classes.

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.

privates.name: Standard Twin Room Private Shared Bathroom
privates.description: In order to secure a Private Room, you will need to book the entire room.
privates.labelDescription: Lovely twin share room with seaview. Has 1 sturdy bunk bed and 1 single bed. All bed linen provided, its a warm and cosy room, opening onto our sunny garden courtyard.

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.

privates.name: Standard Double Bed Private Shared Bathroom
privates.description: In order to secure a Private Room, you will need to book the entire room.
privates.labelDescription: We are an award-winning boutique hostel, right on the water's edge.  Our lovely private double rooms are sunny and warm, heated in winter, and open up on to a courtyard garden, decked out with hammocks, free to use hot tub.

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.
